SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QUE WHERE DEL_STATUS = 'N'
AND QTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND QTYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND QUE_DIVISION = 'ONLINE' ORDER BY QNO

SELECT * FROM QUE Q LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (Q.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE QUE_DIVISION = 'ONLINE'
AND QTITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
AND QTYPE LIKE '%'||#{searchValue}||'%'
ORDER BY QNO

SELECT STD_PER, R.RT_NO, RM_STATUS, RT_NAME, MINPER, MAXPER, A.FILE_PATH, A.FILE_LEVEL FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON(R.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO) FULL JOIN ATTACH A ON(R.RT_NO = A.RT_NO) WHERE A.FILE_LEVEL = 1 GROUP BY R.RT_NO, STD_PER, RM_STATUS, RT_NAME, MINPER, MAXPER, A.FILE_PATH, A.FILE_LEVEL ORDER BY RT_NO

SELECT STD_PER, RM_OPTION, R.RT_NO, RM_STATUS, RT_NAME, MINPER, MAXPER, LIMITPRC FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON(R.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO) LEFT JOIN ATTACH A ON(R.RT_NO = A.RT_NO) WHERE R.RT_NO = #{roomType} GROUP BY R.RT_NO, STD_PER, RM_OPTION, RM_STATUS, RT_NAME, MINPER, MAXPER, LIMITPRC
SELECT A.FILE_PATH, A.FILE_LEVEL FROM ROOM R LEFT JOIN ATTACH A ON(R.RT_NO = A.RT_NO) WHERE R.RT_NO = #{roomType} GROUP BY A.FILE_PATH, A.FILE_LEVEL ORDER BY A.FILE_LEVEL ASC

SELECT RM_NO FROM ROOM WHERE RT_NO = #{roomType} MINUS SELECT RSV.RM_NO FROM RSV LEFT JOIN ROOM ON (RSV.RM_NO = ROOM.RM_NO) WHERE RT_NO = #{roomType} AND CHECKOUT > SYSDATE AND CHECKIN < SYSDATE MINUS SELECT RM_NO FROM BROKEN_HIS MINUS SELECT RM_NO FROM STAY WHERE STAY_STATUS = 'N'
SELECT RT_NO FROM ROOM WHERE RM_NO = (SELECT RM_NO FROM RSV WHERE RSV_NO = #{rsvNo})
SELECT RT.RT_NO AS RT_NO, RT.RT_NAME AS RT_NAME, TERM_TYPE, DAY_TYPE, PRICE FROM ROOM_TYPE RT LEFT JOIN PRC P ON (RT.RT_NO = P.RT_NO) WHERE RT.RT_NO = #{roomType} AND STAY_TYPE = 'STAY'

SELECT RSV_NO, M.NAME, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, RS.STAY_PRICE, RS.CHECKIN, RS.CHECKOUT, RS.RSV_DATE, RS.CI_TIME, RT_NAME, RS.ADULT, RS.CHILD, RS.RSV_REQ, RS.RSV_OPTION FROM ROOM R JOIN ROOM_TYPE RT ON(R.RT_NO = RT.RT_NO) JOIN RSV RS ON (R.RM_NO = RS.RM_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON (RS.MNO = M.MNO) WHERE RS.RSV_STATUS = 'OK' AND RSV_NO = #{rsvNo} AND M.NAME = #{userName} AND M.PHONE = #{phone} GROUP BY RT_NAME, RSV_NO, RS.MNO, M.NAME, RS.STAY_PRICE, M.PHONE, M.EMAIL, RS.CHECKIN, RS.CHECKOUT, RS.RSV_DATE, RS.CI_TIME,RS.ADULT, RS.CHILD, RS.RSV_REQ, RS.RSV_OPTION
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RSV WHERE RSV_NO LIKE '%'||#{rsvNo}||'%'
